ThingDef.label: MSSR
ThingDef.description: A repurposed semi-automatic DMR, designed for incredible accuracy while using a common intermediate cartridge.

ThingDef.label: NFWS
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic DMR fitted with a night-vision scope, designed for incredible accuracy while using a common intermediate cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Zastava M76
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern semi-automatic DMR, fitted with a scope.

ThingDef.label: Zastava ZPAP M70
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern semi-automatic rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable. Even now, it remains the most widespread firearm platform ever made. Created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Zastava ZPAP M70UF
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern semi-automatic rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable. Even now, it remains the most widespread firearm platform ever made. Has a folding stock for bulk reduction. Created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: KR-103 Redwood
ThingDef.description: A rugged semi-automatic rifle design which features a large muzzle brake to greatly reduce recoil. Created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: SA-58 DMR
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern semi-automatic DMR, fitted with a highly advanced digital scope with night vision capabilities.

ThingDef.label: UDMC S7-PVAR
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern semi-automatic DMR with a very long barrel, made for extreme accuracy at long ranges. It is very large and heavy.

ThingDef.label: Ruger 10/22 Carbine
ThingDef.description: A blowback-operated self-loading rifle using an underpowered cartridge. Mostly effective for varmint hunting.

ThingDef.label: Ruger 10/22 Sporter
ThingDef.description: A blowback-operated self-loading rifle using an underpowered cartridge. Mostly effective for varmint hunting.

ThingDef.label: Ruger 10/22 Target
ThingDef.description: An exotic looking blowback-operated self-loading rifle using an underpowered cartridge. Mostly effective for competition shooting.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Mini-14 Ranch Rifle
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market. Fires an intermediate rifle cartridge and is a popular choice for long-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: AR-7 Explorer
ThingDef.description: A blowback-operated self-loading rifle using an underpowered cartridge. Mostly effective for varmint hunting. It can be easily disassembled and stored inside its own stock for ease of transportation.

ThingDef.label: Extar EP9
ThingDef.description: A pistol-caliber carbine based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 9mm. The part that looks like a suppressor is actually a barrel shroud.

ThingDef.label: Colt AR-15A4 MSR
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Bushmaster M4A3
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Bushmaster M4 Patrolman's
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: S&W M&P-15 Sport II
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Ruger AR-556
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Ruger AR-556 (Green)
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: Anderson AM-15
ThingDef.description: A fairly low-budget semi-automatic rifle, fitted with a random assortment of attachments.

ThingDef.label: DDM4 V7 Pro
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle, created for the civilian market. Fitted with an advanced set of optics suited for both close-range and long-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: DDM4 V7 Pro Gun Metal
ThingDef.description: An AR-style rifle which has been converted for fully-automatic fire. Fitted with an advanced set of optics suited for both close-range and long-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: Ruger SFAR 16"
ThingDef.description: A compact, light-recoiling, semi-automatic rifle firing a full-sized cartridge. Optimized for close-range shooting.

ThingDef.label: Ruger SFAR 20"
ThingDef.description: A light-recoiling, semi-automatic rifle firing a full-sized cartridge. Optimized for long-range shooting.

ThingDef.label: Ruger SFAR 20"
ThingDef.description: A light-recoiling, semi-automatic precision rifle firing a long-ranged cartridge. Very accurate.

ThingDef.label: AR-15 .50 Beowulf
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle chambered for a heavy but relatively short ranged caliber.

ThingDef.label: Pheonix Weaponry Christine
ThingDef.description: Christine is a rare custom-built AR-10 configuration chambered for the powerful .45-70 cartridge. She loads from standard SR-25 magazines, capable of holding up to 9 rounds, and she is fitted with an LPVO scope. Her muzzle brake helps to reduce recoil.

ThingDef.label: GQ Armory Paladin
ThingDef.description: A compact rifle firing a heavy magnum cartridge. Very lethal, but short ranged. Made primarily for sporting and home defense, it's limited to semi-automatic fire.

ThingDef.label: HCAR
ThingDef.description: A heavy semi-automatic rifle intended for civilian use. Chambered for the hard-hitting .30-06 cartridge and fitted with a scope.

ThingDef.label: HCAR Auto
ThingDef.description: A heavy automatic rifle. Chambered for the hard-hitting .30-06 cartridge and fitted with a holographic sight. While typically semi-automatic, this one has been custom built for select-fire.

ThingDef.label: Springfield Hellion
ThingDef.description: A bullpup semi-automatic rifle fitted with a reflex sight. Compact and impressively accurate at long range.

ThingDef.label: Springfield Hellion DMR
ThingDef.description: A bullpup semi-automatic rifle fitted with a scope. Compact and impressively accurate at long range.

ThingDef.label: Springfield M1A Scout Squad
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle with a forward-mounted scope, intended to increase target acquisition speed at the cost of precision.

ThingDef.label: Springfield M1A SOCOM 16
ThingDef.description: A compact semi-automatic rifle with a reflex sight, built for close-quarters engagements.

ThingDef.label: SIG 556
ThingDef.description: A compact semi-automatic rifle which features a highly-adjustable folding stock, greatly reducing bulk. Comes equipped with a scope.

ThingDef.label: SIG MCX Spear
ThingDef.description: The civilian version of the M7 battle rifle, fitted with a highly advanced digital scope with night vision capabilities.
